data.name: OECD DAC CRS Purpose Codes (5 digit)
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to an OECD DAC CRS 5-digit purpose code

data.name: OECD DAC CRS Purpose Codes (3 digit)
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to an OECD DAC CRS 3-digit purpose code

data.name: Classification of the Functions of Government (UN)
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to the UN Classification of the Functions of Government (CoFoG)

data.name: Statistical classification of economic activities in the European Community
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to the statistical classifications of economic activities in the European Community

data.name: National Taxonomy for Exempt Entities (USA)
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to the National Taxonomy for Exempt Entities (NTEE) - USA

data.name: AidData
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to AidData classifications

data.name: SDG Goal
data.description: A value from the top-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1’)

data.name: SDG Target
data.description: A value from the second-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1.1’)

data.name: SDG Indicator
data.description: A value from the second-level list of UN sustainable development (SDG) indicators

data.name: Humanitarian Global Clusters (Inter-Agency Standing Committee)
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to an Inter-Agency Standard Committee Humanitarian Global Cluster code

data.name: North American Industry Classification System (NAICS)
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to the NAICS codelist

data.name: UN System Function
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to the UN System Function codelist

data.name: Reporting Organisation
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to a sector vocabulary maintained by the reporting organisation for this activity

data.name: Reporting Organisation 2
data.description: The sector reported corresponds to a sector vocabulary maintained by the reporting organisation for this activity (if they are referencing more than one)
